description: great to manage time and intergrates well with kde.
summary: Amazing a great clock for kde

description:
1. To add a world clock, there is no "add" button after you've found the clock you are looking for. You'd have to tick the box, close the app and relaunch it for the clock to be added.

2. Main clock is only analog and can't be changed to digital.

3. Added world clock is only digital and cannot be changed to analog. Why?

4. You can't edit any of the clocks, even though there is an "edit" button there, which only brings up a box that prompts you search for a clock. Shouldn't it show the clocks that already there to edit them? Isn't that what "edit" buttons do, edit existing things? 

5. There are no tones to choose from. You'd have to choose from system settings. Again, why?

I don't understand the design dicisions of this app. Overall, it is an OK app,and does the littel things I wanted it to do.
Thanks for making this cool app, devs! It looks really nice on both destop and mobile. Love the convergent ui!

Creating an alarm it created 2 identical.
could not find any alarms even though I have an alrm in my musci folder
